Geolocation_permissions_denied.en: Location permissions are granted in the Settings app, selecting the Privacy option, and then choosing the Location Services option. You can then select the website you want to grant permissions to and select the Always option.

Geolocation_permissions_request.en: You'll need to enable the location option to see and share your location. Is it OK if we enable it?
